ARABIC: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I will fill up Hell with you and every one of them who follows you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I will fill up Hell with you together with those who follow you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I will certainly fill the Gehenna with you and with all those among them who follow you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that I shall certainly fill hell with you and your followers all together".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “That I will fill hell with you and with those among them who follow you, all together.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That I will fill Hell with you and those of them (mankind) that follow you, together."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That I will most certainly fill hell with you and with those among them who follow you, all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I shall assuredly fill Gehenna with thee, and with whosoever of them follows thee, all together.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That I shall fill hell with thee and with such of them as follow thee, together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I will fill up Hell with you and every one of them who follows you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That I shall fill Hell with thee and such of them as shall follow thee, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I will surely fill hell with you and all those who follow you.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee,- every one."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That I will fill Hell with you [Iblis (Satan)] and those of them (mankind) that follow you, together."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I shall certainly fill Gehenna with you and every one of them that follows you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I will fill Hell with you, and with every one of them who follows you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:85] I shall assuredly fill Hell with you, by way of [filling it with] your progeny, and with whoever of them follows you, that is, of mankind, all together’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: That I shall fill hell with thee) and with your offspring (and with such of them as follow thee) of the Children of Adam, (together) all those who obey your way.
